programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3466
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep84
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1996
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep249
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children. -

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5062
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Love Punch
programme.desc: Talented boxer Jia Yang is caught in an underground fight to clear her father's debts. She loses her Olympic aspiration and vanishes from the boxing world. 10 years later, Coach Li Yue is determined to help her honour her father's wish by returning to the ring. As passion and obligation collide, can Jia Yang revive her abandoned boxing dream?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ais feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: The Fierce Wife
programme.desc: An Zhen divorces her husband after his infidelity but faces a pivotal decision four years later - to return to her cheating husband and old life or to embark on a new life with a new love?

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty, and their father's drug addiction. Initially, the sisters attempt to appease him, but as they enter adolescence, they ultimately rebel and escape. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Love is the only Answer
programme.desc: At Bo and Cheong wedding reception, the projected was initially showing their journey of love, but suddenly a flash of a clip of Cheong and a sexy girl being intimate came up. Bo calmly ran up to the stage and announced that the wedding is cancelled. The incident rapidly became a hot topic on the internet. Within a year, back to being single again, Bo and the living life happily Cheong maintains a good relationship. One day, Cheong decided to play with love and took Bo to participate in a swinging party. The conservative Bo initially wanted to leave, but after being bribed by Cheong, she helpless and stayed. At the swinging party, the two encounter Kit and his wife Man Lai. The 4 of them develop a romantic and hot relationship... At another wedding reception, when the projector plays the groom and bride's heartwarming clips, a flash of another clip that does not want to be seen comes up...

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty, and their father's drug addiction. Initially, the sisters attempt to appease him, but as they enter adolescence, they ultimately rebel and escape. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Till The End Of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chuns plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Big Brother Cheng fled from the mainland to Hong Kong, where he opened a teahouse in a housing estate, hoping to find a peaceful life. However, relentless provocations from local triad gangs go unaddressed by the police, prompting Cheng and his friends at the teahouse to seek revenge.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Vanessa Hudgens - After a breath-taking repel from a helicopter, Bear and Hollywood actor Vanessa Hudgens evade a boulder avalanche, summit a massive dormant volcano and come face-to-face with a rattlesnake.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Patagonia - Simon Reeve treks across the high mountains and treacherous ice fields of Patagonia, coming face to face with pumas and riding with gauchos.

programme.title: North America with Simon Reeve S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the third leg of his journey, Simon Reeve is travelling down the length of California.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep10
programme.desc: Tastes Like Home - Alaskans soldier through the heart of dark winter in pursuit of the resources they desperately need for survival.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fraser Island - Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Garden Route - In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Kruger's Pafuri - In the northern reaches of the Kruger National Park, life depends on one thing water. In a land burdened by heat and drought a single ribbon cuts its reliable course through the wilderness. Its a lifeline to all creatures, great and small.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies Falls - Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Lower Zambezi - Food, water and shelter are essential to all life on earth from the smallest of beings to the largest, and along the banks of one of Africas greatest rivers, some animals struggle while others thrive. A rhythm drives all animals as they journey in search of what they need to survive, and each must decide where and when to move if theyre to succeed... These are the magical worlds of the Lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hluhluwe-Imfolozi - In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the parks establishment gave rhinos a lifeline breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Superpowers - Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs prey-detecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Fight Club - Step into the ring with natures top brawlers, who use violence to get what they need. Watch the cannibalistic Portia spider devour the competition, uncover the bloodthirsty side of cuddly koalas, and catch an epic neck-whipping giraffe battle.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Penguin Proposal - Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House Hunting Hermit Crabs - Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.desc: A Penguin Proposal - Watch an Antarctic gentoo penguin pop the question with a rocky token of his devotion, then learn how a Madagascar lemur uses toxic millipedes for pest control. Bone up on makeup techniques with a flamingo and meet a honey badger that can pick locks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep2
programme.desc: House Hunting Hermit Crabs - Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Meerkat Survival School - Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Europe - From the Highlands to the Alps, Europes evocative landscapes are the backdrop for epic wildlife drama. Normally stoic red deer go wild during the rut. Wolf packs clash over territory, and foxes do the foxtrot - its not as nice as it sounds.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Masked Bandits - Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wombat Wood - In the cool highlands near Australias Snowy Mountains is Wombat Wood. There, dotted amongst the trees and dense foliage, are over a hundred wombat burrows. But when some of the burrows are flooded, the wombats need to find safety.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joey's Journey - Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, whos trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Yukon Wild - The Yukon is a true wilderness, one of the last on Earth. The vast land got its name from its longest river, which the Gwichin, one of the indigenous people of the region, call "Yu-kun- ah", or, the "great river". The third longest waterway in North America, the Yukon River flows through wide open valleys and narrow channels over 3,000 km Northwest towards the storm tossed Bering Sea.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Waiting for Winter - Its November at Cape Tatnam. Winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay. But the ice - which should be forming on Hudson Bay by now - is nowhere to be seen. 2016 has been the warmest year on record. In late November, the temperature is 10 degrees warmer than its average. Climate change is wreaking havoc across the North. At just below zero degrees Celsius, the sea cannot freeze.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Jaguars - Head out into the Pantanal with Lizzie and the Onafari team on the hunt for a missing dominant male jaguar. Monitor the battle between young hopefuls, like outsider Badalo, who want to usurp his power and win over Fera and the other local females.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mum's the Word - Get to know Fera, the Queen of the Pantanal, as she teaches her rambunctious cub Simba how to climb trees and hunt for dinner. Then learn why Ferinha, another local female, struggles with motherhood as more males move in and threaten the youngsters.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Collar Complications - Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Usana the Cheetah Cub - Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Growing Pains - Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuarys orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dillas fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep11
programme.desc: South Africa - Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism. It all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Nobody Likes Visiting the Dentist - Head into surgery with Mara the koala, who needs a life-saving tooth operation, then assess an injured sugar glider with vet Tim. Cheer as rescue officer Elise pulls a flying fox out of a gutter and see nurse Brees clutch of python eggs hatch.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Platypus Predicament - Stand by as rescue officers use a technique called flagging to nab a koala with dangerously inflamed eyes. Soothe burned possum feet with vet Tim, then shadow vet Karina as she examines a half-drowned platypus before referring him to a specialist.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaires fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Feel the heat as Lizzie and veterinarian Joares scramble to collar more jaguars amid storms, floods, and power outages. Try to pin down the elusive Badalo before his data-gathering tag drops off and meet a new female the team is eager to study.

programme.desc: Episode One sees Donal visit Hare Krishna Island in Lough Erne for a festival, where food offerings to the deities are central to the celebrations.

programme.title: Nadiya's Family Favourites S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Get-Togethers - Nadiya creates dishes ideal for family get-togethers, learns how to perfect her BBQ technique with BBQ-King James, and meets Paul Ainsworth, Michelin Star Chef.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Lucy and Rob's Airstream - Simon Parfett and his team travel down to Devon to meet Lucy and Rob. After years of wanting to set up a B&B on their perfect plot overlooking the Teign Valley, they've finally taken the plunge and bought a '70's Californian airstream.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks The Mediterranean S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spain - Jamie is in Spain in the Catalan region. Inspired by the deep taste from the signature Catalan Sofrito, Jamie watches on as his host cooks Scorpion fish soup.

programme.desc: Herbs - Jason's Dubai journey concludes with a bunch of fresh herby dishes that are inspired by the region and include a tangy tabouleh and a lobster sashimi with frozen herb snow.

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Trains - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode, we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious trains.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Nusfjord Arctic Resort, Norway - Nusfjord Arctic Resort is a preserved 200-year-old cod fishing village in the Lofoten Islands of Norway. Working alongside the dedicated team, Monica and Rob learn to appreciate the difficulties of running a high-end resort in such an extreme environment.

programme.desc: Jamie cooks a tasty aubergine burger, the quickest sesame-seared salmon supper, and chickpea and squash casserole that you can turn into a whole host of delicious dishes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep34
programme.desc: Snooty And The Beasts Part 1 & 2 - After rescuing Kevin and almost having a first kiss, Eep sets up dangerous situations to recreate the moment; Grug and Snoot go on a rescue/mission

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep35
programme.desc: Zero Dunk Thunky / Pie Vs Pie - Thunk is captured by the Broods and develops feelings for Blurg /At the Valley's food competition, Thunk and Ugga mistakenly make a new hit food

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep19
programme.desc: FOMO-OPUP / Lost in the Woods - Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep20
programme.desc: Party Crashed - When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep46
programme.desc: The King And Mrs. Mort - When King Julien gets sick, Mort must attend the Best Kingdom of Madagascar Award ceremony and comes back to find a Queen has taken his place

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep62
programme.desc: Dances With Dingoes - A laid-back, festival-loving dingo emerges from the portal and teaches the orphans to boogie, but Puss soon learns the dance instructor has secret intentions

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep10
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop - When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at Hide & Seek so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now shes going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep22
programme.desc: The Itch To Switch / Mismatched Socks - When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yis violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: Viking For Hire - Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep66
programme.desc: Moon Shot - Our teams startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: How to Start a Dragon Academy - Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep6
programme.desc: Garby - Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep32
programme.desc: Super Sherman / Ada Lovelace - When a meteorite crashes into the Penthouse, Sherman transforms into a superhero and things go from bad to worse when Hobson turns into a supervillain

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep11
programme.desc: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap - On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep37
programme.desc: The Poison Ravine - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep38
programme.desc: The Master Key - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but hes missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewers water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! Its going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before its too late.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep63
programme.desc: Remember Me Not - An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep11
programme.desc: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap - On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep23
programme.desc: New Hat, New Tag! / Furry Tail Ending - When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep69
programme.desc: The Heat is On - On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict no-babies policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep70
programme.desc: One Tricked Pony - An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, Bridges Aflame. Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced theyre the better team leader. programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep7
programme.desc: How to Pick Your Dragon - Stoick wants to train his own dragon and enlists Hiccup to help him tame the most ferocious species yet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer in Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep7
programme.desc: Desert - Under orders from D-Structs, Scrappit steals one of Garby's parts, leading the Dinotrux on a trek through the desert to find help for their friend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep33

programme.desc: It's time to build a den - JoJo and Gran Gran see Cynthia building a new greenhouse and decide to build a den. But when the den is too small both of them to fit in, Gran Gran helps JoJo to build a bigger den.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep24
programme.desc: It's time to make a film - When JoJo hears the announcement of a new Captain Chloe film on the radio, she's disheartened to learn that it won't be available to watch for some time. Luckily, Gran Gran has a Gran Gran Plan!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.desc: Toggle Tangle - After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Little Railway Show - When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Pizza Girls - Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Come Back Cobs - The Cobs have finally had enough of Evil Pea's ungratefulness and team up with Supertato.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep12
programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Bishop Rock Lighthouse, Isles of Scilly - Glitch plunges the sea into darkness in a night-time adventure near the Isles of Scilly.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Irrigation - Uh oh! Glitch accidently uses his size-ray to shrink the Go Jetters and Ubercorn so that they are the size of ants!

programme.title: My World Kitchen S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Naomi's Senegalese Maf Fish - Naomi is making a very special Senegalese seafood dish called Maf Fish. She serves it with white fluffy rice and a traditional, colourful Senegalese drink.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Andy and the Glass Frog - Andy heads to Costa Rica to find out how frogspawn survives in the wild.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep20
programme.desc: Uncle Joe King - Captain Captain's Uncle Joe King is coming to visit. Uncle Joe is the best joker in the family and Captain Captain has got a big plan to play a joke on him!

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Krash discovers an abandoned toy train carriage in the corner of the room.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Kids - A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Chickenrat - It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Neighbours - Bluey needs her Mum's advice on dealing with a troublesome neighbour, when the serenity of her couch cushion playhouse is threatened by Bingo's own growing stable of animals.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Veggies Got to Dance - Supertato's dancing is too powerful and too destructive but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance off to save his trapped friends he soon realises his dancing can save the day.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Compass Navigators - Can Kyan and Foz use new compass skills to navigate their way out of an academy maze?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Wolong Panda Reserve, China - The Go Jetters visit a nature reserve in China. But who's taking all the pandas' bamboo?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.
