programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: Womens Day Special - This week, we take a deep dive into Africas progress toward gender equality, exploring how women are breaking barriers in sports, navigating the challenges of sex work, and reshaping the nightlife scene. From the football field to the streets, we examine the victories, the struggles, and the ongoing fight for recognition and rights.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: How women are conquering metal - Metal bands are tough, hairy, loud, and especially... male. So goes the cliche but is it that really true? We take you on a deep dive into the history of women in the metal scene and highlight bands and singers such as Doro Pesch, Burning Witches, Slave to Sirens or Nervosa. What were the first female metal bands? What prejudices do the bands face? Is Metal really a safe space?

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: The Global Auto and Mobility Show - REV tests the new Volvo EX90, an all-electric luxury SUV. The female bikers of Nairobis Inked Sisterhood are shattering stereotypes. And electric cars could help supply the power grid when power is most needed.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Las Amazonas: Softballs Warrior Women - An indigenous community in Mexico has had strict gender roles stretching back to the Mayan civilization. But Las Amazonas are changing that: a team of women shattering expectations by playing softball in traditional outfits while highlighting the importance of the work they do at home and for their families. Theyve seen success on the field, but it hasnt been easy for the players at home.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: The Science Magazine - Exciting new digital approaches in archaeology; how the capital of the Aztec empire is being brought back to life virtually; why the Sun and Moon dont fall to earth; managing without air conditioning in a hotter world

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: We Come from the Cedar Tree - Life in Canada's Great Bear Rainforest - Canada's Great Bear Rainforest is a place where the rainforest and Pacific Ocean meet. This special forest is home to countless spruce and fir trees. One very special species towers above them all, giving many animals shelter: the giant arbor vitae, or Tree of Life.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.desc: Why Germany is so slow in moving to electric vehicles - Just three percent of the vehicles on the road in Germany are electric. In Norway, the figure is over a quarter. That's because, over the last 18 years, the Norwegian state has forgone the equivalent of around 55 billion euro in tax revenue to promote electric vehicles. Can Germany, with its current budget deficit, afford to offer such generous subsidies?

programme.desc: This program is an animation series about a Japanese dog, Charo. He meets and is helped by many mythical creatures of Northern Japan as he searches for eight star talismans. Tohoku series 1-9.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Most commercial honey in Japan comes from Western honeybees, whose honey can be harvested several times a year. Japanese honeybees are much less productive but keeping them can be a real education.

programme.desc: #45 Would you check the Japanese in my email? / To politely ask someone to do something, use a "te" form verb and "moraemasen ka." For example, "chekku-shite moraemasen ka" (would you check?).

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The ancient capital's dignified air is in part generated by earthen walls. Discover the aesthetic sensibilities and expertise of a traditional plasterer as he pursues beauty in earthen walls.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Wild Hokkaido! takes you to Japan's outdoor treasure trove, Hokkaido. Join us, as we canoe through white water, fish elusive trout in deep forests, camp in serene snowscapes and more! Find adventure!!

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Let'S Enjoy Math
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Akan-Mashu
programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1804
programme.desc: Black History Month - UFC Unleashed is celebrating Black History Month with a look at some of 2022s most exciting fights to come from our roster of black athletes. Featuring Joaquin Buckley, Jared Cannonier, Chris Barnett, and more.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: Perth, Australia is the place as UFC presents a showdown that will shake the foundation of MMA. Middleweight champ Dricus DuPlessis defends his belt against former two time champion Israel Adesanya, who is hungry to regain the title for a historic third time. All this and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep17
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: Perth, Australia is the place as UFC presents a showdown that will shake the foundation of MMA. All this and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kape vs. Almabayev
programme.desc: Prelims - A UFC Flyweight title eliminator between former LFA Flyweight Champion (also former title challenger) Brandon Royval and former RIZIN Bantamweight Champion Manel Kape was expected to headline the event. However, Royval withdrew due to an undisclosed injury. He was replaced by Asu Almabayev. Albamayev was originally expected to face former flyweight title challenger Steve Erceg at the event, but the latter was moved to headline UFC on ESPN: Moreno vs. Erceg and replaced by Allan Nascimento.
